snippet: Stocks were mostly rising in afternoon trading as investors react to mixed corporate earnings.
abstract: Stocks end mostly higher, though gains from rising oil prices are tempered by reaction to mixed corporate earnings reports.
lead_paragraph: Stocks were mostly rising in afternoon trading as investors react to mixed corporate earnings.

headline.main: Market Mostly Higher Amid Mixed Corporate Earnings
headline.print_headline: Earnings Temper Gains From Rising Oil Prices
